name: King Nightmares
description:
King Nightmares is a Indie Horror game about you being behind on work for your job, so you stay at work past dusk (when you & others would have gone home by then) and continue to work until you finish enough work that you consider it significant enough to be cached up for that day! But as your working you notice that something is not quiet right, you feel as if something is watching you...

There are multiple endings to this game, so go download & play to unlock the secrets of King Nightmares!
Join The Discord Server For More Info: DPM Games Offical Discord Server!
Support Me By Subscribing To My YouTube Channel: DPM Games YouTube Channel

PS: I am aware of the current crashing and lighting issues, I'm working on a fix ASAP!
